name: Escult
description:
After being sacrificed by his mother to a demon, Alfred returns as a blood cat to save his little sister from the same gruesome fate. Together, they must escape the labyrinth of their mother's basement and leave their mother forever.

Your objective in the game is to utilize the 9 souls of the cat in order to solve puzzles and help the girl navigate through the rooms.

Controls:
WASD / Arrows - Movement
Tab - Swap between characters
E / Spacebar - Action/Interact
R - Restart the current level
Esc  - Close the game

Art Team:
Guy Weinstein and Aquarium Boy
Programming  Team:
Nadav Alon and Mor Hen

Special thanks for Alficino#1092 for making the game's soundtrack

This game has been made during Game Jam Course in Bezalel Academy
